column6:
It's the end of an era. Bendis and Gaydos bid a fond farewell to the pages of the PULSE, but fear not, they are leaving with a doozy. This stand-alone story leaves Jessica Jones faced with the biggest question of her entire life and tells a secret story from her sordid super hero past. Guest-starring Luke Cage and the New Avengers, this issue leads directly into next month's NEW AVENGERS ANNUAL.,2006,3
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller:Michael Gaydos | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | penciller (cover):Mike Mayhew | letterer:Cory Petit
